an4.257:1.1: Atha kho ayasma malukyaputto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma malukyaputto bhagavantam etadavoca:
an4.257:2.1: “Sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
an4.257:2.2: “Ettha idani, malukyaputta, kim dahare bhikkhu vakkhama;
an4.257:2.3: yatra hi nama tvam jinno vuddho mahallako tathagatassa sankhittena ovadam yacasi”ti.
an4.257:2.4: “Desetu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam; desetu sugato sankhittena dhammam. Appeva namaham bhagavato bhasitassa attham ajaneyyam; appeva namaham bhagavato bhasitassa dayado assan”ti.
an4.257:3.1: “Cattarome, malukyaputta, tanhuppada yattha bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.257:3.3: Civarahetu va, malukyaputta, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.257:3.4: Pindapatahetu va, malukyaputta, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.257:3.5: Senasanahetu va, malukyaputta, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.257:3.6: Itibhavabhavahetu va, malukyaputta, bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.257:3.7: Ime kho, malukyaputta, cattaro tanhuppada yattha bhikkhuno tanha uppajjamana uppajjati.
an4.257:3.8: Yato kho, malukyaputta, bhikkhuno tanha pahina hoti ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma, ayam vuccati, malukyaputta, ‘bhikkhu acchecchi tanham, vivattayi samyojanam, samma manabhisamaya antamakasi dukkhassa’”ti.
an4.257:4.1: Atha kho ayasma malukyaputto bhagavata imina ovadena ovadito utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an4.257:4.2: Atha kho ayasma malukyaputto eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
an4.257:4.3: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
an4.257:4.4: Annataro ca panayasma malukyaputto arahatam ahositi.
